sentences.en: Alabama's Jefferson County is on the verge of bankruptcy.
sentences.cn: 阿拉巴马州的杰弗逊郡已经濒临破产.

sentences.en: An Alabama woman was arrested for riding under the influence.
sentences.cn: 一位阿拉巴马州的妇女因为服药后骑马而被捕.

sentences.en: Are Georgia, Alabama and Florida fighting over water or over growth?
sentences.cn: 佐治亚州 、 阿拉巴马州与佛罗里达州,正在争夺的是水资源还是发展 呢 ?

sentences.en: Condoleezza Rice was born in Alabama on November 14 th, 1954.
sentences.cn: 1954年11月14日, 康多莉扎·赖斯出生于阿拉巴马州.

sentences.en: Do you know that he owns half of alabama?
sentences.cn: 你知道他拥有一半的阿拉巴马州 吗 ?

sentences.en: Federal officials had declared all counties of Alabama are drought disaster areas.
sentences.cn: 联绑官员宣告阿尔巴马州的省是干旱受灾地区.

sentences.en: He fought in the U.S. Civil War and settled in Birmingham, Alabama.
sentences.cn: 参加过南北战争,后来定居于亚拉巴马州伯明翰市.

sentences.en: I come from Alabama, with banjo on my knee.
sentences.cn: 我来自阿拉巴马, 身上带着五弦琴.

sentences.en: In Alabama a boy who snores saws gourds.
sentences.cn: 在阿拉巴马州,打鼾的孩子被叫做锯葫芦.

sentences.en: Johnny Warrick has a hog farm in Alabama.
sentences.cn: 约翰尼·沃里克在亚拉巴马州有个养猪场。

sentences.en: One of the latest casualties is the sewer system of Jefferson county, Alabama.
sentences.cn: 最近的一个受害者是阿拉巴马州杰弗逊县的下水道系统。

sentences.en: She returned to alabama because she could not bear transplantation.
sentences.cn: 她由于无法忍受迁移而返回了阿拉巴马州.

sentences.en: She was convicted of first degree murder, given death penalty in Alabama.
sentences.cn: 她被判为一级谋杀罪, 判处死刑.

sentences.en: The Alabama Case was an famous international law case in 19 th century.
sentences.cn: 阿拉巴马号案是19世纪一件著名的国际法案例.

sentences.en: Two guys were taking chemistry at the University of Alabama.
sentences.cn: 两个阿拉巴马大学的学生选修了化学课.

sentences.en: Which of these american idol finalists from birmingham, alabama was dubbed the velvet teddy bear?
sentences.cn: 以下来自阿拉巴马-伯明翰的三位偶像哪一位为天鹅绒泰迪熊配音?

trans.tran_cn: 阿拉巴马州（美国的一个州）
